resources.string: Repeat the password you entered above
Invalid name. The name must consist of at least 2 letters
Invalid password. The password must contain at least one uppercase and lowercase letter, as well as a number. The minimum length is 5 characters
Invalid surname. The surname must consist of at least 2 letters
There must be at least some date here
Hello, dear %s! We are glad to welcome you to our universal application, which can do nothing but welcome. We hope that you will continue to use this wonderful application and wish you all the best!
